sentences.sContent: Kitty has a scarf and a skateboard.
sentences.sCn: 基蒂有个围巾和溜冰板。

sentences.sContent: He takes me for rides on his skateboard.
sentences.sCn: 他玩滑板的时候也让我坐上去。

sentences.sContent: He has long hair.He has a black skateboard.Who is he?
sentences.sCn: 他有长头发.他有一黑色溜冰板.他是谁？

words.tran: 滑溜冰板的人；滑板运动员

trans.tranOther: a short board with two small wheels at each end, which you can stand on and ride for fun or as a sport
